sentences.en: As Schopenhauer does , Kierkegaard criticizes traditional rationalism and Christian theology and initiates modern humanism.
sentences.cn: 克尔凯郭尔和叔本华一道批判了传统的理性主义和基督教神学,开创了现代人本主义.

sentences.en: Coleridge was to spend the next thirty years attacking rationalism.
sentences.cn: 柯尔律治在之后的30年里一直抨击理性主义。

sentences.en: However, the modern rationalism proposed by Descartes started with a general doubt.
sentences.cn: 值得一提的是, 由笛卡尔所倡导的近代理性哲学以研究知识的可靠性和l必然性 为己任,却是从普遍怀疑开始的.

sentences.en: Irrationalism is opposite to traditional rationalism.
sentences.cn: 非理性主义是对传统理性主义的反动.

sentences.en: Its core idea is that functionalism rationalism.
sentences.cn: 其核心思想就是功能主义理性主义.

sentences.en: Meanwhile, Habermas criticizes post - modern philosophy's turning to non - rationalism.
sentences.cn: 哈贝马斯同时批判后现代哲学转向非理性主义.

sentences.en: Namely, anti - rationalism of the Enlightenment and the intellectual elite overweening attitude.
sentences.cn: 即 反 理性主义和知识精英唯我独尊的启蒙心态.

sentences.en: News reports should embody rationalism and demonstrate human concern.
sentences.cn: 摘要构建和谐传媒,需要营造和谐的新闻传播生态.
接受科学唯理论的哲学家们

sentences.en: Rationalism also part of the T personality.
sentences.cn: 理性至上也是T-人格的一部分.

sentences.en: Rationalism usually considers itself more religious than empiricism.
sentences.cn: 理性主义总以为自己比经验主义更有宗教信仰.

sentences.en: The opposite of empiricism is rationalism.
sentences.cn: 经验论的对立面是唯理论.

sentences.en: The original purpose of rationalism and empiricism is to find ways to know the world.
sentences.cn: 理性主义与经验主义作为一种认识论,原旨在于探求认识世界的途径与方法.

sentences.en: The rationalism, opposite to empiricism , holds the theory of innate ideas.
sentences.cn: 与经验主义相对应的理性主义者坚持天赋观念论的立场.

sentences.en: These standpoints are contrary to constructivist rationalism.
sentences.cn: 这与建构理性主义的观点恰恰相反.

sentences.en: This paper presents a brief analysis of Rationalism in automatic morphological analysis.
sentences.cn: 本文简要评述了自动词形分析中的理性主义研究方法.

words.tran_cn: 理性主义者，唯理主义者
实行合理化；作辩解；合理地思考
使……合理化；使……有理化；为……找借口

trans.tran_en: the belief that your actions should be based on scientific thinking rather than emotions or religious beliefs
